ch0257_00_qibana/0101_0701_01_10:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I see you’re all
fired up and ready to go again today!
ch0257_00_qibana/0101_0701_02_10:
You’ve got all the force of a raging storm. Even
I feel like I’m gonna get blown away!
ch0257_00_qibana/7101_0701_01_10:
Don’t let changes in the weather faze you in
battle—no matter what happens!
ch0257_00_qibana/7101_0701_02_10:
Trainers and their partner Pokémon work together
as one, right?
ch0257_00_qibana/7101_0701_03_10:
If a Trainer loses their cool over something, they
may end up losing a battle—even one that’s going
their way!
ch0257_00_qibana/7102_0701_01_10:
People really show their personality when they’re
being photographed, don’t you think?
ch0257_00_qibana/7102_0701_02_10:
Take Leon’s Charizard pose, for example, or
Nessa’s modeling photos.
ch0257_00_qibana/7102_0701_03_10:
Maybe I need to think of a new pose for myself
as well!
ch0257_00_qibana/7103_0701_01_10: Selfies are an important part of my style.
ch0257_00_qibana/7103_0701_02_10:
I actually started taking them so I’d never forget
the sting of my defeats.
ch0257_00_qibana/7103_0701_03_10:
But now when I take a perfect selfie, the feeling I
get is just as good as when I pull off a brilliant
move in battle!
ch0257_00_qibana/7104_0701_01_10:
With all these Trainers gathered on Pasio, there’s
probably someone here who’s stronger than Leon.
ch0257_00_qibana/7104_0701_02_10:
But no matter how strong they are, I’ll beat them
all and rise to the top!
ch0257_00_qibana/7104_0701_03_10:
I’ll make sure everyone here on Pasio knows the
name of the great Raihan!
ch0257_00_qibana/7105_0701_01_10:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. Do you have a
rival that you feel like you just have to beat?
ch0257_00_qibana/7105_0701_02_10:
A proper rival makes all your training sessions
that much better.
ch0257_00_qibana/7105_0701_03_10:
There’s no shortage of rivals here for you to
compete against! You can all get better together!
ch0257_00_qibana/1701_0701_01_10:
Oh, there you are. Here—a present from the
great Raihan!
ch0257_00_qibana/1701_0701_02_10:
Make good use of it to keep on getting stronger
as a Trainer.
ch0257_00_qibana/1701_0702_01_10:
Knowing when and where to use items is an
important part of being a good Trainer!
ch0257_00_qibana/2501_0701_01_10:
Gym Leader Raihan doesn’t simply control the
weather. He also seeks two-on-two battles!
ch0257_00_qibana/2501_0701_02_10:
But battles here on Pasio are different than they
are back in Galar.
ch0257_00_qibana/2501_0701_03_10:
I’m learning a lot from watching your
battling style.
ch0257_00_qibana/2501_0702_01_10:
When it comes to team battles, being able to work
together with other Trainers is important, right?
ch0257_00_qibana/2501_0702_02_10:
Well, I fall in sync with you pretty easily, so I’m
not worried about us at all!
ch0257_00_qibana/2511_0701_01_10:
Hey, what do you plan to do once you reach the
top here on Pasio?
ch0257_00_qibana/2511_0701_02_10:
Me, I’m completely focused on taking down Leon.
Training for that is tons of fun. I’m not even
thinking about what comes next after I beat him.
ch0257_00_qibana/2511_0702_01_10:
What’s that? Even if I beat Leon, I still have to
face you?
ch0257_00_qibana/2511_0702_02_10:
Haha! I guess you’re right! Leon’s not the only
superstrong Trainer out there!
ch0257_00_qibana/2511_0702_03_10:
I like that cheek of yours! All right! Guess I’ve got
another day of hard training ahead of me today!
ch0257_00_qibana/3001_0701_01_10:
You going out to train this early, mate? Hah!
I knew you had massive potential as a Trainer,
but now you’re just flexing!
ch0257_00_qibana/3003_0701_01_10:
Ah, the sun feels amazing today! Makes me feel
like I’m alive, y’know what I mean? And it really
sets my battles on fire, too!
ch0257_00_qibana/3005_0701_01_10:
A cool breeze at night feels amazing after a day
of sweating on the battlefield, eh? We got some
good training in today, though!
